original_title: The Great 14th: Tenzin Gyatso, The 14th Dalai Lama In His Own Words
overview: â€œThe Great 14th: Tenzin Gyatso, The 14th Dalai Lama In His Own Words", uniquely and exclusively features Tenzin Gyatso as both subject and narrator as he presents the full arc of his epic and very public life as the 14th Dalai Lama. Based on intimate conversations, it's a portrait both profound and inspiring.
title: The Great 14th: Tenzin Gyatso, The 14th Dalai Lama In His Own Words
